SEARCH
Package HMS.src.user

Class AdministratorManager

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.user.AdministratorManager
public class AdministratorManager extends Object
The AdministratorManager class handles operations related to administrative tasks in the hospital management system. These include adding and removing staff, viewing staff details, and managing credentials. The class interacts with various CSV helper classes to perform data manipulation and storage.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdministratorManager

      public AdministratorManager()

  • Method Details

    • addStaff

      public void addStaff(User staff)
      Adds a new staff member to the system. Generates a unique staff ID based on the staff role and ensures the staff entry is added to the staff CSV. A default password is also set for the new staff member.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member to be added, represented as a User object.

    • removeStaff

      public void removeStaff(String staffID)
      Removes a staff member from the system based on their staff ID. Administrators cannot be removed from the system.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the staff member to be removed.

    • viewStaff

      public void viewStaff()
      Displays a list of all doctors and pharmacists in the system. The list is sorted by role, name, gender, and age, in that order. The role is color-coded for better visibility.

    • colorCodeRole

      private String colorCodeRole(String role)
      Helper method to assign ANSI color codes to roles for terminal display.
      Parameters:
      role - The role of the staff member (e.g., "Doctor", "Pharmacist").
      Returns:
      A string representing the role, color-coded for terminal display.

    • addMedication

      public void addMedication(Medication medication)
      Adds a new medication to the inventory. Ensures the medication name is unique and assigns a new medication ID.
      Parameters:
      medication - The medication object containing details like name, stock, low threshold, and dosage form.

    • updateMedicationStock

      public void updateMedicationStock(String medicineID, int newStock)
      Updates the stock of a specific medication in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medicineID - The ID of the medication to update.
      newStock - The new stock level to be set for the medication.

    • updateLowStockAlert

      public void updateLowStockAlert(String medicineID, int newThreshold)
      Updates the low-stock alert threshold for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicineID - The ID of the medication to update.
      newThreshold - The new threshold value to trigger low-stock alerts.

    • viewMedicationInventory

      public void viewMedicationInventory()
      Displays the current medication inventory in a tabular format. Includes details like medication ID, name, stock levels, low stock alerts, and status.

    • determineStockStatus

      private String determineStockStatus(int initialStock, int lowStockAlert, int stockLeft)
      Determines the stock status (High, Moderate, Low) based on stock levels and thresholds.
      Parameters:
      initialStock - The initial stock level of the medication.
      lowStockAlert - The low-stock alert threshold for the medication.
      stockLeft - The current stock level of the medication.
      Returns:
      A string representing the stock status, color-coded for terminal display.

    • approveReplenishmentRequest

      public void approveReplenishmentRequest(String requestID, boolean approve, String adminID)
      Approves or rejects a replenishment request for a specific medication. If approved, updates the stock level in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      requestID - The ID of the replenishment request.
      approve - Boolean flag indicating whether the request is approved or rejected.
      admin - The administrator approving or rejecting the request.

    • getPendingReplenishmentRequests

      public List<String[]> getPendingReplenishmentRequests()
      Retrieves a list of pending replenishment requests.
      Returns:
      A list of string arrays, each representing a pending replenishment request.

    • viewAppointments

      public void viewAppointments()
      Displays all appointments in the system in a tabular format. Includes details like appointment ID, patient ID, doctor ID, date, time, status, and outcome.

    • padColoredString

      private String padColoredString(String str, int width)
      Pads a colored string to a specific width, accounting for ANSI color codes.
      Parameters:
      str - The colored string containing ANSI codes
      width - The desired width of the visible text
      Returns:
      The padded string with proper spacing

    • viewScheduledAppointments

      public void viewScheduledAppointments(List<Appointment> appointments)
      Displays a list of scheduled appointments.
      Parameters:
      appointments - The list of appointments to display

    • removeMedication

      public void removeMedication(String medicineID)
      Removes a medication from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medicineID - The ID of the medication to remove

    • getAdminNameByID

      public String getAdminNameByID(String adminID)
      Gets the administrator's name by their ID.
      Parameters:
      adminID - The ID of the administrator
      Returns:
      The administrator's name if found, null otherwise
